query: Analyze ROAS drop in last 30 days

creatives.headline: Rediscover Comfort: New Designs Just Arrived
creatives.body_text: We've listened to our community. Our latest collection features breakthrough comfort technology and fresh seasonal designs that move with you. Shop the new arrivals now and discover what's changed.
creatives.reasoning: Address creative fatigue by introducing fresh designs and messaging angles. Shift focus from 'comfort basics' to 'innovation and new products' to re-engage existing audiences experiencing ad fatigue.
creatives.target_audience: Existing customers, high-frequency users (primary fatigue sufferers)

image_recommendations: Product showcase with model wearing new designs
Customer testimonial with product in lifestyle setting
format_details.color_scheme: Warm, inviting tones (warm neutrals, earth tones) reflecting comfort and quality
format_details.text_hierarchy: Headline emphasizes 'NEW' (strongest trigger), body highlights 'breakthrough' and 'technology', CTA drives action
format_details.brand_safety: Include logo, brand colors, maintain tone

creatives.headline: Feel the Difference
creatives.body_text: 15-second video showcasing the transformation from uncomfortable to confident. Features new comfort technology with emphasis on freedom of movement and all-day wear confidence.
creatives.reasoning: Video increases time-on-page, emotional connection, and engagement significantly. Demonstrates product benefit through visual storytelling, driving higher conversion probability and ROAS. Targets cold/new audiences who haven't experienced creative fatigue.
creatives.target_audience: Cold traffic, lookalike audiences, new users

key_scenes: 3-8s: Product showcase with close-ups of comfort features, technology details
8-12s: Benefit demonstration (confidence, freedom, comfortable all-day movement)
12-15s: Brand messaging + customer testimonial snippet + CTA
format_details.music_style: Upbeat, modern, energetic but not distracting. Builds emotional connection without overpowering message.
format_details.visual_style: Professional product photography + lifestyle scenes with real customers. Clean cuts, high production value, consistent brand colors
format_details.captions: Essential (80% watch without sound on mobile)
format_details.production_quality: HIGH - Professional videography, color grading, music licensing

performance_prediction.caveat: Video effectiveness varies by audience familiarity. Cold audiences typically show higher lift.
performance_prediction.based_on: Video performance benchmarks for product category

creatives.headline: See What's New
creatives.body_text: Swipe through our latest designs and innovations. Discover new comfort technology and seasonal collections.
creatives.reasoning: Carousel format allows showcasing multiple product variants and features, increasing engagement by giving users control. Higher CTR due to multiple swipeable cards and interactive nature.

carousel_cards.headline: New Arrival: Comfort Tech Collection
carousel_cards.description: Engineered for all-day comfort and confidence

carousel_cards.headline: 4 New Designs, 1 Amazing Fit
carousel_cards.description: Choose your favorite style from our expanded collection

carousel_cards.headline: Customer Favorite: Now in New Colors
Fresh Styles for Every Season
carousel_cards.image_recommendation: Lifestyle scene showing product in use

creatives.headline: Transform Your Comfort
creatives.body_text: Experience the breakthrough technology that's changing how people feel. New design. New comfort. New confidence. Limited time offer on new collection.
creatives.reasoning: Benefit-focused messaging addressing the confidence and comfort angle. Creates urgency with 'limited time' while emphasizing 'breakthrough' and 'new' to combat fatigue.

format_details.color_scheme: Bold, vibrant accents with clean minimalist background
format_details.urgency_elements: Limited time call-out, new indicator badge

creatives.headline: What Changed? Everything.
creatives.body_text: Our customers told us what they wanted. Listen to what we built. New designs. Upgraded comfort. Same quality you trust. Now in 12 new styles.
creatives.reasoning: Customer-centric messaging showing brand listens to community feedback. Emphasizes 'new' while maintaining trust angle. Addresses fatigue with freshness narrative.

ab_test_recommendations.hypothesis: New creative messaging addressing creative fatigue will improve CTR vs. existing top-performing creative
ab_test_recommendations.practical_significance: If CRE_001 wins with CTR 2.0%+, recommended for scaling to 60% of budget
decision_criteria: CRE_001 CTR < 1.8% = REJECT, TRY DIFFERENT CREATIVE
ab_test_recommendations.follow_up_action: Winner (if >1.9% CTR) scales to 50% budget for 2 weeks, monitor for ROAS impact

ab_test_recommendations.hypothesis: Video format will achieve higher ROAS than static image creative due to increased engagement and emotional connection
ab_test_recommendations.practical_significance: Video typically shows 15-20% ROAS improvement for product category. If validated, video becomes primary format.
decision_criteria: Video ROAS < 2.9 = VIDEO UNDERPERFORMS, STICK WITH STATIC
ab_test_recommendations.follow_up_action: If video wins, allocate 40% budget to video + 40% static + 20% carousel for 3 weeks

ab_test_recommendations.primary_objective: Validate that fresh creative specifically addresses fatigue in existing segments
ab_test_recommendations.hypothesis: Fresh creative performs better with high-frequency users (experiencing fatigue) vs. new audiences who haven't seen previous creatives

segment_b.name: Lookalike & New Audiences
segment_b.audience_definition: Lookalike audiences + website visitors + new contacts

expected_insights: Segment A: High CTR improvement (15-20%) from fresh creative
Segment B: Baseline/slight improvement (5-10%), less fatigue factor
Validates that creative fatigue was primary issue
decision_criteria: If Segment A ROAS > Segment B = Creative fatigue hypothesis CONFIRMED
If Segment A ROAS = Segment B = Other factors also involved
If Segment A ROAS < Segment B = Re-evaluate root cause

creative_strategy.overall_approach: Refresh messaging to combat creative fatigue and re-engage existing audiences with new design angle while capturing new audiences with emotional storytelling
creative_strategy.differentiation_from_current: Existing creative emphasizes 'comfort basics' and 'everyday wear'. New creative emphasizes 'innovation', 'new designs', and 'transformation' to signal freshness and combat fatigue.

target_segments.rationale: Most affected by creative fatigue, primary performance decline drivers
No prior exposure to creatives, need strong emotional connection, higher conversion potential
Some fatigue but not primary victims, good test segment for creative variations

week_1.rationale: Test creative refresh in parallel with control to minimize disruption

week_2.rationale: Add video test while continuing creative refresh test

week_3.rationale: Scale winners, test secondary creatives, retire control

week_4_onward.rationale: Stable rotation with continuous testing cadence

week_1.action: Launch TEST_001 (Fresh Design CRE_001 vs. Control)

week_2.action: Add TEST_002 (Video CRE_002 vs. Static), continue TEST_001

week_4_onward.action: Implement steady-state rotation with continuous testing
week_4_onward.success_criteria: Metrics sustained above baseline, new creatives tested every 2 weeks

creative_rotation_recommendations.testing_approach: Always test new variant against current best performer
creative_rotation_recommendations.winner_retention: Keep winning creative in mix for 4-6 weeks before rotation
